main event: A strange light was observed in the sky for 30 minutes near Fort Lupton, Colorado on June 24, 1967.
interesting points: The object was described as a round, pea-sized blue-white light.
The object was observed to be stationary in the sky.
The report was filed by Guy J. Laflamme, an A.T. at Lowry Air Force Base.
No photographs were taken of the object.
witnesses: Guy J. Laflamme, A.T., USAF, Lowry AFB
